trans-unit.source: An instance of VoiceChangeEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event.
trans-unit.target: VoiceChangeEventArgs példánya létrejön, amikor a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objektum vált ki a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the identity of the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Az új identitás beszerzése <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, hozzáférés a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>tulajdonsága a következő eseményhez: a kezelő.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Módosíthatja a hang, használja a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>egyetlen a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>tartozó <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>módszerek vagy a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>tartozó <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>vagy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>módszerek.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"></xref> object of the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"> </xref> az új funkcióinak objektum.

trans-unit.source: The Voice property gets the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: A beszédfelismerési tulajdonság lekérdezi a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>objektum amikor egy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>egy esemény jelenik meg.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information that describes and identifies the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Ismerteti, és azonosítja az új hang információt adhatja vissza.
